descript.abstract: A spatial data layer containing point geometry features for representing both the physical and mailing addresses for properties, buildings, and sub-address locations in Baltimore City, as documented in the City's real property and property location database sources. The data employs what's referred to as the City native schema/data standard, which has specific attribute field names, field formats, and data standards to support internal City services. The data contained in this data layer (number of features, accuracy, point locations) will match the data in the other address point data layer on Open Baltimore (“Address Point (NG911)”), just the format of the attribute field names and data standards will be different, as well as some internal City attributes fields have been added to support internal City services not related to a NG911 system. This data also employs the NAD 1983 StatePlane Maryland FIPS 1900 (US Feet) projected coordinate system (WKID: 2248). Data is updated on a quarterly basis.
descript.purpose: A spatial data layer containing point geometry features for representing both the physical and mailing addresses for properties, buildings, and sub-address locations in Baltimore City, in the City native schema/data standard.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
